ovdesc.p: This file is used to map the fields of existing files in T24 modules with the fields of the classic property classes of AA. Certain parameter files of existing T24 modules have been split into different property classes in AA. These are called classic product.

desc.p: This field represents the compare value for the target property of the classic property class
This field represents the name of the source property class
This field represents the rule that can be attached to the fields. Should be a valid id from the file EB.COMPARISON.TYPE
This field represents the name of the target property of the classic property class
This field represents the name of the source field that would map to the field in the designer template of the classic property class
This field represents the name of the product group the property class would belong to.
This field represents the name of the target field in the designer table of the given classic property class
The field represents the actual file name whose fields are mapped to the given property class
This field represents the name of the validation routine that can be attached for the classic mapping
This is is the main control field in the source file.
This field represents the separator that would appear in the id of the classic property class
This field represents the id of the mapping file. The id is the name of the classic property class
